courseDetails.title: Word Stress of American English
courseDetails.shortDescription: American Accent: Creating Rhythm in Words
courseDetails.longDescription: Sometimes people don't understand us if we make the seemingly innocent mistake of stressing the wrong syllable!  Or they may understand, but their comprehension may get slowed down or their attention may be unavoidably distracted by the change in sound.  Stressing the wrong syllable can totally change the sound of a word, to the point where it is unrecognizable.  In this course, you'll master rules and patterns for predicting word stress.  You'll even predict the stress of words you've never seen before without having to consult the dictionary.  Learn which syllables to stress and which syllables not to stress.  Learn how to use vowel length, pitch, volume and energy to stress a syllable.  Then learn how to relax on unstressed syllables.   Learn about primary stress vs. secondary stress and the rule of alternating stress.  Learn how part of speech affects word stress and how suffixes can shift the stress of a word.  Learn which suffixes hold stress, shift the stress or don't affect the stress of a word.  Also learn how to stress compound words with two and three parts.  You'll even learn how to stress phrasal verbs or idiomatic verbs.  Reinforce all the lessons with repetition audio for each section.  This will build your muscle memory and reinforce the right stress in your mind..  End the course with a  humor review.  Students who have completed at least 50% of the course may attend free monthly live office hour on Zoom to ask questions and receive live corrections
targetAudiences: Intermediate and advanced students of English

courseDetails.title: Adobe Illustrator. Ilustración digital a nivel profesional
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende desde cero a trabajar con  ilustraciones digitales de manera profesional en Illustrator
courseDetails.longDescription:
Adobe Illustrator es un potente editor de gráficos vectoriales desarrollado y comercializado por Adobe Inc. Se utiliza ampliamente por diseñadores gráficos, artistas e ilustradores para crear ilustraciones, logotipos, diagramas, gráficos y más. Illustrator utiliza ecuaciones matemáticas para crear formas y trazados en lugar de píxeles, lo que permite la escalabilidad sin pérdida de calidad. Esto lo hace especialmente útil para crear diseños que necesitan ser redimensionados con frecuencia, como logotipos o iconos. También ofrece una amplia gama de herramientas para dibujar, pintar, tipografía y manipulación de imágenes, lo que lo convierte en una herramienta versátil para proyectos de diseño impresos y digitales.

En este curso de Adobe Illustrator tendrás la oportunidad para aprender a utilizar esta potente herramienta de diseño gráfico de manera efectiva y creativa. El curso cubre una variedad de temas, desde los conceptos básicos de la interfaz y las herramientas, hasta técnicas avanzadas de ilustración y diseño.

Durante el curso, aprenderás cómo crear formas básicas, trazar líneas y curvas, aplicar colores y degradados, trabajar con texto, utilizar capas y máscaras, y exportar sus creaciones en diferentes formatos. También podrás explorar técnicas más avanzadas como la creación de patrones, la manipulación de imágenes y la integración con otras aplicaciones de Adobe, como Photoshop e InDesign.

El curso está pensado para adaptarse a diferentes niveles de habilidad, desde principiantes absolutos hasta usuarios experimentados que buscan perfeccionar sus habilidades.

En resumen, este curso de Adobe Illustrator te proporcionará los conocimientos y habilidades necesarios para crear diseños profesionales y creativos utilizando esta popular y potente herramienta de diseño gráfico.
targetAudiences: Diseñadores gráficos, diseñadores editoriales, illustradores y cualquier persona con interés en temas del mundo gráfico

courseDetails.title: Adobe InDesign & Diseño editorial y publicaciones digitales
courseDetails.shortDescription: Diseña un periódico, calendarios, revistas de moda, cubiertas de libros y mucho más. Diseño gráfico avanzado en InDesign
courseDetails.longDescription:
No hay nada más bonito que perseguir una idea, hasta materializarla gráficamente sobre un soporte físico. Podemos pensar en el diseño de la cubierta de un libro, el branding de una empresa o el diseño de una presentación con la que narrar una historia. Cada proyecto es diferente y demandan creatividad y técnica a partes iguales. Ahí reside su belleza.


  • ¿Qué es Adobe InDesign?

Adobe InDesign es un software diseñado por Adobe, utilizado para el diseño de documentos y paginar, periódicos, revistas, libros y cualquier material de publicación que se nos ocurra. Programa fácil de comprender y dinámico, nos permite crear cosas tan interesantes y prácticas como un diseño de página que incorpore elementos como títulos, textos, imágenes e incluso enlaces para visualización posterior en páginas Web. También nos permite configurar nuestras propias plantillas, crear hojas de estilo para evitar el establecimiento de parámetros como la fuente, el tamaño… y otros muchos accesos directos para acelerar el proceso de diseño y hacer la vida del maquetador un poco más sencilla.


  • Destinatarios

El curso de Adobe Indesign va dirigido a ilustradores, diseñadores gráficos, maquetadores que trabajen tanto en papel como en digital, periodistas, profesionales del sector, diseñadores en general que quieran mejorar sus trabajos, empresas y a todo aquel que quiera aprender a maquetar con este maravilloso programa.


  • My background

Mi nombre es Manuel Pallarés. Soy  diseñador editorial en la editorial EDAF, en donde trabajo diseñando los interiores y cubiertas de diferentes colecciones. Además doy clases presenciales en la Universidad de la asignatura de Diseño gráfico Llevo trabajando con InDesign desde hace más de 10 años y con este curso me gustaría transmitiros todo ese conocimiento acumulado en lo que para mi es uno de los programas más bonitos por su mezcla de precisión y técnica y capacidad creativa.


  • Este curso de InDesign

Al finalizar este curso, estarás en capacidad de usar InDesign de forma eficiente y profesional en el diseño de cualquier tipo de proyecto editorial, desde publicaciones pequeñas y sencillas hasta publicaciones de gran tamaño y complejidad.

La metodología usada está basada en ejemplos prácticos, por lo cual, éste curso incluye los archivos de ejemplo para que puedas descargarlos y practicar cada uno de los ejercicios mostrados.

Puedo asegurarte, sin dudarlo, que este es el curso avanzado de InDesign mas extenso y completo que podrás encontrar el cual está compuesto por 56 lecciones organizadas en 4 secciones las cuales suman 9  horas de contenido. Si eres un usuario que ya conoce este programa, no necesitas ver todos los temas ni seguir un orden específico, por el contrario, puedes ver la descripción de cada sección y lección y decidir qué temas ver.

The course then progresses to cover essential concepts such as basic programming constructs in Java, character sets, identifiers, variables, and constants. Object-oriented programming principles will be introduced, enabling students to create classes, objects, and methods to build modular and reusable code. You will know about: business administration, its functions and focuses; how to manage material flows and human resources; what is organizational structure, its types and how to synchronize different departments; what is project management and its methods; setting goals and planning in organizations; what is ethic in business; logistic and its characteristics; how to develop organization

8. Business logistics

9. Organizational development management

Course Full Description and Welcome Letter: Executive Program in Business Administration

This course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads of departments, etc. The course could help to improve your managerial skills and also to create annual company plan, budgets and effectively set organizational goals.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge and instruments of administrative management or business administration. Also, here you can find interesting tools and, for example, different types of organizational structures.


All this information will help you to gain more confidence in your position as a manager or CEO.


The Executive Program in Business Administration is a comprehensive and intensive course designed to equip professionals with the essential knowledge and skills required for effective administrative management in a business environment. This program covers a wide range of topics that are crucial for individuals aspiring to build successful careers or establish their own businesses.


Administrative Management: This topic explores the fundamental principles and practices of administrative management, including decision-making, problem-solving, and effective communication within an organization. Participants learn how to streamline processes, improve productivity, and foster a positive work culture.


The Essence of Business Administration: This module delves into the core concepts and theories that underpin business administration. It focuses on the key functions of management, such as planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and how they contribute to the overall success of an organization.


Management of Material and Human Resources: This topic addresses the crucial aspects of managing both material resources (e.g., inventory, supplies) and human resources (e.g., recruitment, training, performance evaluation). Participants gain insights into effective resource allocation, talent management, and enhancing employee productivity.


Organizational Structure and Synchronization of Departments: This module examines the design and implementation of organizational structures and explores strategies for coordinating and synchronizing different departments within an organization. Participants learn how to optimize communication and collaboration across teams to achieve organizational goals.


Project Management: This topic introduces participants to the principles and practices of project management, emphasizing the planning, execution, and control of projects. It covers the advantages and disadvantages of project management, various project management methodologies, and techniques for managing risks and stakeholders.


Goal Setting and Planning in Organization: This module focuses on the importance of setting clear goals and developing effective plans to achieve them. Participants learn how to create actionable plans, align goals with organizational objectives, and monitor progress towards achieving desired outcomes.


Ethics of Business: This topic explores the ethical dimensions of business administration and highlights the significance of ethical decision-making and responsible business practices. Participants gain an understanding of ethical frameworks and learn how to navigate complex ethical dilemmas in the business world.


Business Logistics: This module addresses the management of the flow of goods and services within a business. It covers topics such as supply chain management, inventory control, transportation, and distribution. Participants learn how to optimize logistics processes to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.


Organizational Development Management: This topic focuses on strategies and techniques for managing organizational change and development. Participants gain insights into the importance of adapting to evolving market dynamics, fostering innovation, and building a resilient and agile organization.


Importance of Business Administration for Building a Career and Own Business:


Understanding the principles and practices of business administration is vital for individuals seeking to build successful careers or establish their own businesses. Here's why:


Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.


Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.


Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.


Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.


Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.


Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.


Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.


Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.


In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.


Linked topics:

  • Business Fundamentals

  • Business Strategy

  • Management

  • Business Management

  • Leadership

  • Business Administration

  • MBA Master Degree preparation

  • CEO

  • Chief Executive Officer
targetAudiences: Course for any who want to build a career at management, business and entrepreneurship.

courseDetails.title: Professional Scrum Master Certification: Definitive Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Scrum Fundamentals and Ace Your PSM Exam
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock Your Potential as a Certified Scrum Master

Are you ready to take your career to new heights? Our comprehensive Scrum Master certification preparation course is designed to equip you with the knowledge, skills, and confidence needed to excel in one of today's most in-demand and lucrative roles.

Imagine yourself leading high-performing teams, driving innovation, and delivering exceptional results in the fast-paced world of Agile project management. As a certified Scrum Master, you'll be at the forefront of modern business practices, commanding respect and competitive salaries in industries ranging from tech to finance and beyond.

Disclaimer: Independent Preparation Course

This course is designed to help you prepare for the Professional Scrum Master® level 1 (PSM I ®) assessment offered by Scrum Org. However, it's important to note that this course and its associated practice exams are independently created and maintained.

We are not officially endorsed by, partnered with, or affiliated with "Scrum Org". Our goal is to provide valuable educational content to support your learning journey towards becoming a certified Scrum Master.

While we strive to align our material with the official Scrum Guide and assessment requirements, we recommend that students also refer to official "Scrum Org" resources as part of their comprehensive preparation.

By engaging with this course, you acknowledge that it is an independent study resource and not a guarantee of certification success. The final assessment and certification are conducted solely by "Scrum Org".

This course offers:

  1. Expert-led instruction from industry veterans and academic professionals

  2. Engaging, interactive content that brings Scrum principles to life

  3. A lot of practice questions to sharpen your skills and boost exam confidence

  4. Exclusive "PSM I Sniper" lectures with insider tips for first-attempt success

  5. Scientifically-backed learning techniques to optimize knowledge retention

  6. Real-world case studies and practical examples

  7. A risk-free 30-day money-back guarantee

Why Scrum Master?

The role of Scrum Master has emerged as one of the most sought-after positions in today's job market, offering both professional growth and financial rewards. Here's why becoming a Scrum Master could be an excellent career move:

  1. Lucrative Salary Potential:

    • Glassdoor reports that Scrum Masters are among the highest-paid professionals, with an average annual salary exceeding $97,000.

    • A 2019 study by Scrum Org revealed even more promising figures, with Scrum Master salaries averaging $98,000+ and reaching up to $150,000+ per year.

  2. High Demand and Career Prospects:

    • LinkedIn recognized Scrum Master as one of the Most Promising Jobs in its 2019 report, highlighting the role's growing importance across industries.

    • As more organizations adopt Agile methodologies, the demand for skilled Scrum Masters continues to rise.

  3. Versatile Skill Set:

    • Scrum Masters develop a unique blend of technical knowledge, leadership skills, and business acumen.

    • These transferable skills open doors to various career paths, including project management, Agile coaching, and organizational leadership.

  4. Impact on Organizational Success:

    • Scrum Masters play a crucial role in improving team efficiency, product quality, and overall organizational agility.

    • This position offers the opportunity to drive meaningful change and contribute directly to business success.

  5. Continuous Learning and Growth:

    • The Agile landscape is constantly evolving, providing Scrum Masters with ongoing opportunities for professional development and learning.

By pursuing a career as a Scrum Master, you're not just choosing a job – you're embarking on a path of continuous growth, leadership, and innovation in the ever-evolving world of Agile project management.

  1. Aspiring Scrum Masters:

courseDetails.title: Personal Productivity & Life Planning

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Personal Productivity

Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

Personal productivity is a crucial skill set for individuals seeking career success and personal happiness in today's fast-paced and demanding world. This comprehensive course on Personal Productivity is designed to provide participants with the necessary tools, strategies, and mindset to optimize their management skills, enhance leadership abilities, and achieve personal and professional goals. By focusing on key topics such as time management, goal setting, and self-development, this course empowers individuals to cultivate a productive and fulfilling life.


Introduction to Personal Productivity

In this module, participants will be introduced to the concept of personal productivity and its significance in their career and overall happiness. They will explore various theories and models related to productivity enhancement, setting the stage for a comprehensive understanding of the course. Key topics include:


The Ying Yang Concept

Understanding the delicate balance between work and personal life is essential for achieving sustainable productivity and maintaining a healthy well-being. Participants will learn strategies to strike a harmonious equilibrium between professional responsibilities and personal fulfillment.


Balance Wheel

The Lecture Balance Wheel is a powerful tool for evaluating and assessing various dimensions of life, such as health, relationships, career, finances, personal growth, and leisure. Participants will learn how to utilize this tool to identify areas that require attention and create a balanced and fulfilling life.


Productivity Pyramid

The Productivity Pyramid provides a structured approach to personal productivity, enabling individuals to prioritize tasks and focus their efforts on high-value activities. T


Values

Understanding one's core values is crucial for aligning personal and professional goals and making decisions that are in harmony with one's true self. Participants will explore their values and learn how to incorporate them into their daily lives to enhance motivation, drive, and overall productivity.


Values Detaily

Delving deeper into the concept of values, participants will learn how to define their values in detail. By understanding their values at a granular level, individuals can make intentional choices that are in line with their authentic selves, leading to increased satisfaction and productivity.


Understanding Burnout

Burnout is a prevalent issue in today's high-pressure work environments, and it can significantly impact both career progression and personal well-being. This module will delve into the causes and symptoms of burnout, as well as strategies to prevent and overcome it. Key topics include:


7 Reasons for Burnout

Participants will gain insights into the seven common causes of burnout, such as excessive workload, lack of control, insufficient support, and conflicting values. Understanding these factors is crucial for identifying and mitigating burnout risks.


Burnout Syndrome

Participants will explore the physical, emotional, and psychological effects of burnout syndrome. They will learn to recognize the warning signs and implement effective strategies to restore well-being and productivity.


Navigating VUCA (Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity, Ambiguity)

In today's rapidly changing business landscape, individuals need to be equipped with the skills and mindset to navigate VUCA situations effectively. This module will provide participants with the necessary tools to thrive amidst volatility, uncertainty, complexity, and ambiguity.


VUCA Concept

Participants will understand the VUCA framework and its implications in personal and professional contexts. They will learn strategies to manage ambiguity, embrace change, and make informed decisions in dynamic environments.


Henry Ford Theory

Henry Ford's Theory of Productivity emphasizes the importance of efficient processes and time management. Participants will explore Ford's principles and learn how to streamline their workflow, eliminate wasteful activities, and maximize productivity.


Flexibility and Adaptability

In an ever-changing world, being flexible and adaptable is vital for personal and professional growth. This module will focus on developing the mindset and skills necessary to embrace change and thrive in diverse environments.


Developing Flexibility

Participants will learn techniques to develop adaptability, resilience, and agility. They will explore strategies for embracing change, overcoming resistance, and seeking opportunities for personal and professional growth.


Practical Tasks

Throughout the course, participants will engage in five practical tasks aimed at applying the concepts learned. These tasks will challenge participants to integrate productivity techniques into their daily lives, providing opportunities for reflection, feedback, and improvement.


Importance of Learning and Training Personal Productivity for Career and Happiness:

Learning and training personal productivity skills are of paramount importance for individuals seeking career success and personal happiness. Here's why:


Career Success:

Effective time management, goal setting, and self-management skills are fundamental to career advancement and productivity. By learning to prioritize tasks, set clear goals, and manage their time efficiently, individuals can maximize their productivity and achieve professional success. Additionally, developing strong management skills and leadership qualities through personal productivity training allows individuals to effectively lead teams, solve problems, and drive organizational success.


Personal Happiness:

Personal productivity training goes beyond professional success and extends to personal fulfillment and happiness. By optimizing their time and resources, individuals can create a better work-life balance, nurturing their relationships, pursuing personal passions, and prioritizing self-care. Personal productivity skills also foster a positive mindset, resilience, and adaptability, enabling individuals to navigate challenges, manage stress, and maintain overall well-being.


By equipping themselves with management skills, leadership qualities, and a strong foundation in personal productivity, individuals can unlock their full potential, achieve their goals, and lead fulfilling lives. This course serves as a transformative journey towards personal and professional growth, combining the principles of time management, goal setting, and self-development with the principles of happiness, positive psychology, and mindset optimization.
targetAudiences: Course for any who want to develop personal productivity and management skills

The Personal Productivity course provides a comprehensive overview of essential skills and concepts to enhance individual effectiveness and efficiency in various aspects of life. Through a combination of theoretical frameworks and practical exercises, participants will gain valuable insights and tools to optimize their personal productivity and achieve their goals. This course covers a range of topics, including:

Introduction to Personal Productivity: This module introduces the fundamental principles and benefits of personal productivity, emphasizing the importance of self-management and goal-oriented behavior.
Ying Yang Concept: Explore the concept of balance and harmony in personal productivity, learning how to strike a healthy equilibrium between work and personal life.

Lecture Balance Wheel: Understand the concept of the Balance Wheel, a powerful visual tool for assessing and improving different areas of life, such as career, health, relationships, and personal growth.
Productivity Pyramid: Discover the Productivity Pyramid framework, which helps individuals prioritize tasks, manage time effectively, and optimize workflow.
Values and Values Detailing: Identify personal values and learn how aligning actions with core values can enhance motivation, decision-making, and overall satisfaction.
Reasons of Burnout and Burnout Syndrome: Recognize the warning signs and causes of burnout, and explore strategies for preventing and overcoming this common productivity obstacle.
VUCA Concept: Understand the VUCA (Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity, Ambiguity) concept and develop resilience and adaptability skills to thrive in rapidly changing environments.
Henry Ford Theory: Learn from Henry Ford's principles of efficiency and productivity, discovering ways to streamline processes and optimize resource utilization.
Flexibility: Gain insights into the importance of flexibility and adaptability in personal productivity, exploring strategies for effectively managing change and unexpected circumstances.
The course also includes five practical tasks that allow participants to apply the concepts learned to real-life scenarios, fostering a deeper understanding and practical skill development.
How Learning Personal Productivity Skills Can Benefit Career, Business, and Personal Development:

Mastering personal productivity skills has a profound impact on various aspects of professional and personal life. By honing these skills, participants can enhance their management and leadership capabilities, drive business success, and achieve personal development goals. Some of the key benefits include:

Management Skills and Leadership: Personal productivity skills equip individuals with effective time management, task prioritization, and goal-setting techniques, enabling them to lead and manage teams more efficiently.

Business Management and CEO Success: Improved personal productivity directly translates into better business management, enabling CEOs and business leaders to optimize processes, drive productivity gains, and achieve organizational goals.

People Management and Team Management: With enhanced personal productivity skills, managers can effectively manage and delegate tasks, empower their teams, and foster a more productive work environment.

Goal Setting and OKR (Objectives and Key Results): Personal productivity skills help individuals set clear and actionable goals, align their efforts, and track progress using the OKR methodology, driving personal success and organizational growth.

Mindset and Subconscious Mind: Personal productivity training enhances self-awareness, cultivates a growth mindset, and taps into the power of the subconscious mind to overcome obstacles and unlock hidden potential.
Task Management and Overwhelm: By mastering task management techniques, individuals can reduce overwhelm, increase focus, and accomplish more in less time.

Happiness and Positive Psychology: Effective personal productivity practices enhance well-being and happiness by reducing stress, improving work-life balance, and promoting positive psychology principles.

Personality Development and Personal Development: Personal productivity skills contribute to overall personality development by fostering discipline, resilience, and continuous learning, leading to personal growth and self-improvement.

Mindfulness and Coaching: Personal productivity training often incorporates mindfulness techniques, promoting present-moment awareness, stress reduction, and enhanced focus. Additionally, coaching methodologies can provide individual support and guidance throughout the personal productivity journey.

Personal Transformation: Mastering personal productivity skills can lead to transformative changes in all areas of life, empowering individuals to achieve their full potential and experience personal transformation.
Join the Personal Productivity course and unlock the tools and knowledge to optimize your performance, achieve your goals, and lead a more fulfilling and productive life.

You will know about: what is operational management and why is it important; what kind of methods, approaches and systems OM has, what is risk in OM; how to forecast and plan in OM; tasks and types of OM; what are the Kanban, Poka Yoke, Toyota Production System, Lean management, Six sigma, Conveyor system and Economies of scope


After finishing a course you will get: key knowledge about operational and production management, how to manage systems in operational management and how to use it effectively and convenient


Course Plan:

1. About the course, topic and author

2. Operational management and its history, forms and methods of production management

3. Tasks and types of operational management, development of production plan

4. Forecasting and planning

5. Control and quality systems

6. Operational risk management

7. Methods and approaches

8. Economies of scope

9. Kanban and Poka Yoke


This online course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads, etc.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge, types, methods, principles of operational management. Also, here you can find and get to know important systems and approaches, such as Lean management, Six Sigma, Toyota Production System and other interesting topics. In addition, you will learn different instruments and methods to manage production management.


Course Full Description

The Executive Diploma in Operations Management is designed to provide professionals with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in the field of operations management. This comprehensive course covers key concepts, strategies, and tools used in managing and optimizing business operations. From planning and forecasting to risk management and quality control, participants will gain a deep understanding of the principles and practices that drive operational excellence. The course also explores the role of operations management in leadership, management consulting, and career advancement. Whether you're an aspiring manager, a seasoned professional, or an MBA candidate, this course will equip you with the essential skills needed to thrive in the dynamic world of operations management.


Introduction to Operations Management

  • Understanding the role of operations management in organizations

  • Key concepts, theories, and frameworks in operations management

  • Aligning operations strategy with business objectives

  • The impact of operations management on overall organizational performance


Planning, Forecasting, Controlling, and Quality

  • Strategic planning and tactical decision-making in operations management

  • Demand forecasting techniques and their application

  • Quality management principles, tools, and techniques


Risk Management

  • Identifying and assessing risks in operations

  • Developing risk mitigation strategies


Methods and Approaches

  • Business process reengineering and optimization techniques


Economy of Scope and Scale

  • Understanding economies of scale and scope in operations

  • Cost reduction strategies and efficiency improvements


Tools Examples: Kanban

  • Introduction to Kanban as a visual management tool


Tools Examples: Poka Yoke

  • Understanding Poka Yoke (mistake-proofing) concepts


Importance of Operations Management in Career Building:

Operations management plays a vital role in building a successful career in various fields, including leadership, management, MBA preparation, management consulting, and more. Here are some key reasons why a strong foundation in operations management is crucial for career growth:


  1. Leadership and Management Skills: Operations management equips professionals with essential leadership and management skills. It teaches individuals how to plan, organize, and control resources efficiently, making them effective leaders and managers in any organizational setting.

  2. Business Fundamentals: Operations management provides a deep understanding of the fundamental principles that drive business operations. This knowledge is invaluable for professionals seeking to make strategic decisions, optimize processes, and drive overall business performance.

  3. Project Management: Operations management encompasses project management principles and techniques. By mastering these skills, professionals can successfully execute projects, meet deadlines, manage resources, and deliver high-quality results, making them valuable assets to any organization.

  4. MBA Preparation: For individuals considering pursuing an MBA or other advanced management degrees, a strong foundation in operations management is essential. It provides the necessary knowledge and skills required for success in MBA programs and enhances career prospects in various industries.

  5. Management Consulting: Operations management expertise is highly sought after in the field of management consulting. Professionals with a deep understanding of operations can assist organizations in improving efficiency, reducing costs, and enhancing overall performance, making them valuable consultants to businesses.

The Executive Diploma in Operations Management offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers essential topics and tools required to excel in the field of operations management. By developing a strong understanding of operations management principles and practices, participants will be well-equipped to make strategic decisions, optimize processes, and drive operational excellence in their organizations. Whether you aspire to be a leader, enhance your management skills, pursue an MBA, or excel in management consulting, this course will provide you with the necessary knowledge and skills to achieve your career goals.

courseDetails.title: Information Security Fundamentals
courseDetails.shortDescription: The very basics of InfoSec
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is meant for anyone curious about InfoSec and just starting out in this field. Terminology and concepts are explained with the goal of being clear even to those who hear of them for the very first time.


The following topics are covered mainly with definitions and theoretical explanations, but also with some practical examples:

- The need for InfoSec

- CIA Triad (Confidentiality, Integrity, Availability)

- Non-repudiation

- Risk Assessment & Risk Management

- Cryptography and it's place in InfoSec

- Authentication and Authorization

- Governance and Information Security Policies

- Security Auditing

- Laws & Regulations related to Security and Privacy of Data

- Security Detection and Response

- Vulnerability Management

- Security Patching

- Penetration Testing


As an experienced Cybersecurity expert, I've changed a few roles and seen different approaches to security, mainly in large corporations. I'm happy to provide insight into how those systems operate, and more importantly, how they're secured. You will learn that it's not all about advanced technology you hear about these days, but also about people, processes, education, and analytical thinking. I truly hope you will find value in these lessons, and feel free to reach out shall you have any questions, suggestions, or ideas to share.


Later on, I will add tests in between lessons, including some additional information on differences between all the security disciplines: infosec, cybersec, physical, fraud...
targetAudiences: This course is for anyone interested in learning the very basics of InfoSec. Explanations are meant even for those who hear these terms and concepts for the first time.

courseDetails.title: Build from Scratch a Modern REST API with PHP 8
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build from scratch a clean PHP 8 backend API based on scalable and powerful N-Tier architecture
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you eager to master the art of building professional and efficient REST APIs using the latest features of PHP 8? Look no further! This comprehensive Udemy course will equip you with all the necessary skills and knowledge to create robust n-tier RESTful APIs using all the latest PHP 8 features!


Whether you are a seasoned PHP developer or a beginner looking to dive into API development, this course is designed to cater to your needs. Through a hands-on approach, you'll learn step-by-step how to design, build, and secure a fully functional REST API from scratch.


Starting with the fundamentals, you'll gain a solid understanding of the REST architectural style and its principles. You'll explore the HTTP protocol and learn how to leverage its methods and status codes to create API endpoints that adhere to industry standards.


As you progress, you'll delve into the world of PHP 8, discovering its latest features and enhancements that make API development more streamlined and efficient. You'll learn how to set up your development environment, configure PHP for optimal performance, and harness the power of the PHP 8 syntax (such as the `match` expression, the PHP 8.1 `enums`, and so much more!).


Throughout the course, you'll work on real-world projects, allowing you to apply your knowledge to practical scenarios. You'll learn how to handle authentication and authorization, implement CRUD operations, handle error responses, and optimize your API for scalability and performance.


Moreover, you'll explore best practices and design patterns for building clean, maintainable, and testable code. You'll become familiar with popular PHP frameworks and libraries that simplify the API development process, such as Laravel, Lumen, and Slim.


In addition to these frameworks, you'll also utilize essential Composer packages like RedBean and DotEnv PHP. RedBean provides an easy-to-use ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) solution for database management, while DotEnv PHP allows you to manage environment variables effortlessly, enhancing the security and portability of your API.


By the end of this course, you'll have a solid foundation in creating RESTful APIs using PHP 8 and be ready to tackle complex API projects with confidence. Whether you're building APIs for mobile applications, web services, or IoT devices, this course will empower you to unleash the full potential of PHP 8 for API development.


Enrol the course now and embark on a journey to become a proficient REST API developer with PHP 8!
targetAudiences: Anyone who needs to build a REST API from scratch with PHP
Anyone seeking to build a real-world PHP API, from start to end
Anyone wishing to level up their skills in building complex PHP API applications
Anyone looking to work with PHP 8 for Web development
Level up your skillset and confidence in PHP / OOP for building complex applications (e.g. APIs)
Anyone looking to build an API from the very beginning to the end, including clean code, good practices and design patterns

courseDetails.longDescription:
Dear Ayurveda Learner,

Namaste!


I am a seasoned Ayurveda expert Vaidya Kanika, with 15 years of experience in Ayurveda practice and training. I am excited to welcome you to the world of Ayurveda and promote experiential learning!! Please watch free preview lectures. I am sure you will love them!


Welcome to "Find Your Ayurvedic Body Type: Diet & Lifestyle Guide," a transformative journey into the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda. This course is designed to help you discover your unique body type, or Dosha—Vata, Pitta, or Kapha—and provide personalized recommendations for diet and lifestyle to achieve optimal health and well-being.


In this comprehensive course, you'll start by learning the fundamental principles of Ayurveda, including the characteristics and functions of each Dosha. You'll then take an in-depth assessment to determine your specific body type. With this knowledge, you'll explore tailored dietary guidelines, including foods to favor and avoid, to maintain balance and harmony within your body.


The course also delves into lifestyle practices suited to each Dosha, covering daily routines, exercise, and stress management techniques that align with your unique constitution. You'll gain practical insights into seasonal adjustments, herbal remedies, and detoxification methods to support your health throughout the year.


By the end of this course, you will have a clear understanding of your Ayurvedic body type and the tools to create a personalized diet and lifestyle plan. Embrace the holistic approach of Ayurveda to boost your energy, enhance your well-being, and achieve lasting balance and vitality. Join us and unlock the secrets to a healthier, happier you.


  1. Understand the Prakriti: Explore the meaning, functions and impact of dosha, the three primary body types (prakriti), how the body types form and much more.

  2. Identify Your Prakriti: Understand your unique Ayurvedic body type—Vata, Pitta, or Kapha—through a detailed assessment.

  3. Explore Body Type Traits: Understand your body type and how your body behaves physically, physiologically, and emotionally. Learn the major traits so you can control or navigate them effectively.

  4. Dietary Guidelines: Learn specific dietary recommendations tailored to your Dosha to promote balance and optimal health.

  5. Food Classes: Get a detailed understanding of how you should consume grains, dairy, fruits, vegetables, alcohol, and many more classes of foods according to your body type.

  6. Lifestyle Practices: Discover daily routines, exercise regimens, and stress management techniques suitable for your body type.

  7. Practical Application: Gain practical tips and tools to implement Ayurvedic principles into your daily life, leading to sustainable health and wellbeing.

Expand your Ayurvedic journey by exploring my other courses. Dive into "Dinacharya: Mastering Daily Routines for Optimal Health," get deeper understanding of Ayurvedic concepts with "Detailed Fundamental Course in Ayurveda," and enhance your dietary knowledge with "Ayurvedic Nutrition: Eating for Balance and Wellness."

courseDetails.title: Plywood, Glass, Building Hardware & Sanitaryware Businesses
courseDetails.shortDescription: Plywood, Glass, Building Hardware, Sanitaryware Businesses, Construction management, Entrepreneurship, Business
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Course in Plywood, Glass, Building Hardware & Sanitaryware Businesses

Crafting Modern Spaces: Exploring the World of Plywood, Glass, Building Hardware & Sanitaryware Businesses

In the realm of architecture and interior design, the choice of materials plays a pivotal role in shaping the aesthetics, functionality, and overall ambiance of a space. Plywood, glass, building hardware, and sanitaryware are indispensable components that contribute to the construction and embellishment of contemporary structures. In this master course, we delve into the fascinating world of these businesses, exploring their significance, innovations, and the evolving trends that define them.

  1. Plywood: The Backbone of Structural Integrity

Plywood, a versatile engineered wood product, serves as the backbone for many construction projects. Its laminated layers provide strength, stability, and durability, making it an ideal material for flooring, roofing, and structural components. Recent advancements have led to the development of eco-friendly and sustainable plywood options, catering to the growing demand for environmentally conscious construction practices.

  1. Glass: Transforming Spaces with Transparency and Elegance

The use of glass in modern architecture goes beyond mere functionality. It introduces transparency, natural light, and a sense of openness to spaces. From energy-efficient glass solutions to smart glass technology that adapts to changing light conditions, the glass industry is continuously innovating. Decorative glass panels and customized designs further showcase the artistic potential of this material, turning buildings into captivating works of art.

  1. Building Hardware: Ensuring Functionality and Security

Building hardware encompasses a wide range of products, including door handles, locks, hinges, and fasteners, which are crucial for both functionality and security. Advances in technology have given rise to smart locks and access control systems, revolutionizing the way we secure our homes and businesses. The aesthetic appeal of architectural hardware is also gaining attention, with designers incorporating stylish and ergonomic elements into their creations.

  1. Sanitaryware: Elevating Hygiene and Design

The sanitaryware industry has witnessed a shift towards designs that seamlessly blend functionality with aesthetics. High-tech toilets with integrated bidet features, sensor-based faucets, and space-saving vanity solutions are transforming bathrooms into luxurious and efficient spaces. Sustainable practices are also making their mark, with water-saving fixtures becoming increasingly popular.

Evolution and Trends:

  • Sustainability: All four industries are experiencing a surge in demand for sustainable and eco-friendly products. From responsibly sourced plywood to energy-efficient glass and water-saving sanitaryware, businesses are aligning with environmental concerns.

  • Technology Integration: Smart technologies are infiltrating the construction and interior design sectors. Smart glass, intelligent hardware, and automated sanitaryware are becoming staples in modern buildings, offering convenience, efficiency, and a touch of luxury.

  • Customization: Consumers are increasingly seeking personalized solutions. Customized glass designs, unique hardware finishes, and tailor-made plywood solutions allow for the creation of spaces that reflect individual tastes and preferences.

The plywood, glass, building hardware, and sanitaryware industries are not merely suppliers of materials; they are integral contributors to the evolution of modern architecture and design. With sustainability, technology integration, and customization at the forefront, these businesses are shaping the way we build and experience spaces. Scrum Master Certification/ Assessment


Unlock the Full Potential of Agile with the Scrum Master Certification Assessment from Agile Enterprise Coach

Welcome to the Scrum Master Assessment, comprehensive evaluations designed for individuals seeking to confirm their understanding and proficiency in the Scrum framework. This assessment is not a theoretical course but a practical examination that reflects real-world scenarios and applications of Scrum, as outlined in the Official Scrum Guide.


For Employees/ Individuals: Advance Your Agile Career

As an aspiring or current Scrum Master or Product Owner, this assessment will serve as a benchmark for your Scrum and Product Ownership knowledge and skills, allowing you to:

  • Validate Expertise: Demonstrate your mastery of the Scrum framework and stand out in a competitive job market.

  • Career Advancement: Enhance your resume and LinkedIn profile with the certification, opening doors to new opportunities and career growth.

  • Credibility and Recognition: Gain the confidence of peers and employers with a certification that showcases your commitment to the Agile mindset.


For Organisations/Scrum Teams : Elevate Your Team's Agile Capabilities

In the fast-paced world of technology and product management, Agile methodologies have become the cornerstone of successful product delivery. Implementing Scrum within your organization can revolutionize the way you manage projects, enhance team collaboration, and drive better product outcomes. Our Scrum Master Certification Assessment offers numerous advantages for your organisation:

  • Skill Validation: Ensure that your Scrum team members possess a solid understanding of Scrum practices, principles, and values.

  • Continuous Improvement: Pinpoint areas where your teams excel and where they need further training, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.

  • Competitive Edge: By having certified Scrum Masters, your company can stay ahead of the curve in Agile product management, attracting clients and projects that value certified expertise.


The Role of a Scrum Master: Facilitator of Agile Excellence

The Scrum Master is a pivotal role within Scrum teams, acting as a facilitator, coach, and servant leader. As a Scrum Master, you are responsible for:

  • Ensuring Scrum Adoption: Guide your team in following Scrum practices, principles, and rules as described in the Official Scrum Guide.

  • Facilitating Scrum Events: Conduct effective Sprint Planning, Daily Scrums, Sprint Reviews, and Sprint Retrospectives to maximize collaboration and progress.

  • Impediment Removal: Address and eliminate obstacles that hinder your team's performance, ensuring a smooth path to project completion.

  • Coaching and Mentoring: Empower your team by promoting self-organization, cross-functionality, and continuous improvement in Agile practices.


Why Choose Our Scrum Master Certification Assessments?

Our assessment is meticulously crafted to reflect the depth and breadth of the Scrum framework as per the Official Scrum Guide. Here’s what sets our Scrum Master Certification Assessment apart:

  • Real-World Relevance: Questions are designed to challenge and reflect real-life scenarios that Scrum Masters encounter, ensuring practical understanding.

  • Comprehensive Coverage: The assessment spans all essential Scrum topics, from roles and artifacts to events, providing a thorough evaluation of your Scrum knowledge.

  • Instant Feedback: Upon completion, receive immediate insights into your performance, helping you to pinpoint questions for further study or confirmation of your expertise.

  • Scrum Master Certificate: Successful candidates can request a Scrum Master Certificate for this course to be issued by Agile Enterprise coach, adding a tangible credential to their professional portfolio.


Assessment Structure and Content for Scrum Master Certification Assessment

The Scrum Master Certification Assessment consists of a series of multiple-choice questions covering a wide range of topics, including but not limited to:

  • Scrum Theory and Principles

  • The Scrum Team: Roles and Responsibilities

  • Scrum Events: Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, and Sprint Retrospective

  • Scrum Artifacts: Product Backlog, Sprint Backlog, and Increment

  • Definition of Done


How to Get Certified as Scrum Master from Agile Enterprise Coach, London:

  1. Study the Official Scrum Guide: Familiarize yourself with all the concepts and guidelines.

  2. Take the Assessment: Complete the multiple-choice questions to the best of your ability.

  3. Submit Proof of Completion: Send us screenshots of your completed tests to us to receive your Scrum Master and Product Owner Certificates from Agile Enterprise Coach.

  4. Add to Your Credentials: Include your certification in your CV .

courseDetails.title: Git for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn everything you need to use Git and GitHub to track and store the changes of your source code.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Git is one of the most popular version control systems. This course will teach you how to work with Git to track and store the changes of your source code.

First, you will learn the bascis about Git. You will learn what version control systems are and how local, centralized, and distributed version control systems work.

After this, you will learn how to set up Git on your machine. You'll learn how to configure Git, so that your name and email are stored with every commit.

Next, you will learn how to work with local repositories. You will use the commandline to create a repository on your machine and I will show you how to stage and commit changes.

After this, you will learn how to branch and merge your code to work on specific features of your project. You will also learn how to handle merge conflicts that can happen when multiple developers are working on the same code base.

Finally, you will learn how to push your code to a remote repository on GitHub, how to clone an existing repository from GitHub, and how to use pull requests to collaborate with other developers.


After this course, you will have the skills and knowledge needed to use Git successfully in your projects.
targetAudiences: This course is intended for anyone who wants to learn how to use Git to track and store the changes of their source code.

Throughout the course, participants will engage in a variety of learning activities, including lectures, case studies, group discussions, practical exercises, and assessments.
